comments: This controller works as it should. I love the button lay out of the X box controller period. I just wish the blue color wrapped all the way around. But that is just a personal preference
name: Sophia Yates

comments: It's constantly disconnecting. I keep having random issues where it'll disconnect for no reason, then reconnect, then only the thumb sticks and d pad work, but nothing else. Then I'll unplug it and plug it back in and it'll work fine for an hour, then do the same thing again. It constantly disconnects every 30 seconds via bluetooth.
name: Lottie Davenport

comments: That's terrible to hear! We never want technical issues ruining your fun. We're sending an email your way to get you back in the game ASAP!
name: Lorna Mays

comments: Sorry to say these controllers don't last at all. The controller keeps sticking. Thankfully there is a warranty you can purchase. However every time i exchange the controller i have to purchase a new warranty.
name: Dennis Bullock

comments: I love my blue controller. Never any issues and very fluid movements. We are an xbox family. We 9wn many xbox products.
name: Payne Riddle

comments: These newer controllers are great! Connectivity is phenomenal, and utilizes a USB-C port. Oh, and it is BLUETOOTH and will work for games on your phone when connected!!
name: Edwards Drake

comments: I gave this to my 12-year-old son for Christmas. He loved it. The blue is so vibrant and bright. It happens to be his favorite color. He's pretty rough on things, and this controller has held up well,very durable.
name: Lowe Whitaker

comments: The color on the controller is an awesome blue. Buttons are all crisp and feel snappy. Feels good in the hand. Works as intended.
name: Christa Ramos

comments: Awesome controller. Love all the colors they have for them as well. Just sync and play and you're all set. I'd buy these again and again.
name: Bruce Santiago

comments: It works perfectly you don't have to worry about the controller stick in the buttons or anything like that but it's a very good controller so whoever buys it is very good quality.
name: Lacey Hensley

comments: For being a new version on Xbox next gen. controller feels light, like if it’s empty and doesn’t feel complete. Looks good but that’s it. Just looks good.
name: Gail Warren

comments: My son bought this for himself after christmas he absolutley loves it his old controller no longer charged and had a drift to it so gaming was difficult now he can play with ease.
name: Tiffany Mcconnell
